rows.PROTOCOL LAYER INDEX — DAO HEADQUARTERS: The protocol layer lives HERE, inside the IonWave Trade. The Trade IS the protocol. This index maps every protocol component.
Protocol = substrate (formal state machine, permissions, dependencies, equity triggers). Show = optional layer on top. Same system, two descriptions.

rows.col_3: What It Formalizes
TUP lifecycle as formal states + transitions + guard conditions
rows.col_5: No TUP enters LOCKED without grade ≥ B from authorized grader

rows.col_3: Who can do what to which tabs — 4 expressions: prose, matrix, columns, rules
rows.col_4: Role × Tab Type × Permission matrix + IF-THEN rules
rows.col_5: Trustee has R,AU on everything. PM scoped to assigned cluster only.

rows.col_3: What blocks what — formal preconditions + TUP×TUP matrix
rows.col_4: Precondition rules (PRE-01 to PRE-12) + B/S/— matrix
rows.col_5: M0 BLOCKS all TUPs. Nothing moves without thesis.

rows.col_3: Token-like distribution with formal trigger conditions tied to state machine
rows.col_4: EQ-01 to EQ-10 rules + cap table template
rows.col_5: T45 is the ONLY transition that vests PM equity.

rows.col_3: Claude produces 80%, PM refines 20% — explicit, not hidden
rows.col_4: Permission model + workload math + mediation rules
rows.col_5: All Claude writes pass through human filter before system entry.

rows.col_3: Canonical names, aliases, responsibilities — prose description
rows.col_5: Every tab references canonical names only.

rows.col_3: A/B+/B/C/D/F rubric with weighted graders
rows.col_4: Course analogy: syllabus, assignments, midterm, final, GPA

rows.col_3: Phase 0-7 prose description — the narrative companion to the state machine
rows.col_5: Same content as State Machine, human-readable.

rows.col_3: Prose + table — the narrative companion to Dependency Protocol
rows.col_5: Same constraints as Dependency Protocol, human-readable.

rows.col_3: Trustee role with fiduciary duties and intervention authority
rows.col_5: Trustee has AU permission on all protocol components.

rows.col_2: State Machine + Permissions + Dependencies + Equity Triggers
rows.col_3: Formal. Machine-readable. Could be implemented as smart contracts. Coordinates without humans understanding it.

rows.col_2: MC Show + Career Boosters + Cast Page + Story
rows.col_3: Human-readable. Makes protocol observable. Recruits people. Optional — protocol works without it.

rows.col_2: 41 M-level models + S-level + F-level + I-level TUPs
rows.col_3: The actual business knowledge. What the protocol coordinates the production of.

rows.col_2: Protocol is substrate. Show is optional layer on top.
rows.col_3: You could run this state machine without the show. The coordination works. Nobody watches. The show makes the protocol legible — but the show is not the protocol.

rows.PROTOCOL LAYER INDEX — DAO HEADQUARTERS: The IonWave Trade is the first instantiation of the protocol. It IS the protocol, running live.
coordinationprotocols.com should articulate the protocol layer that makes the narrative layer possible.
Paper 1 (white paper) describes the protocol in academic terms. The Trade implements it in spreadsheet.
Paper 2 (results paper) documents what happened when the protocol ran. Did the state machine work? Did equity trigger correctly? Did dependencies hold?
The Trade is not a project within DAO infrastructure — it IS the DAO headquarters. The protocol layer is the DAO. IonWave is the first company it launches.

rows.col_3: Go/no-go gate for Week 0. Claude calibration test. 15-point checklist.
rows.col_5: P-tabs must produce B-grade output on first pass with any competent PM + Claude.

rows.col_3: 8 structural mechanisms to prevent midding. Automatic secondary review trigger.
rows.col_4: Defense mechanisms table + midding vs real grading comparison
rows.col_5: If expert gives 100% B+ across cluster, secondary review auto-triggers.

rows.col_3: Two-key system for state transitions. Librarian + Conductor counter-sign.
rows.col_4: Two-key transition table + compliance role mapping
rows.col_5: No single person can both initiate and confirm a state transition.

rows.col_3: $500 hard floor. All roles equity-only. All tools free tier. Inventory delayed until funded.
rows.col_4: Cash expense table + equity-only roles + free tools + deferred items
rows.col_5: Total cash to start: ~$500. Everything else is equity + free tools.

rows.col_3: People risk mitigation. Risk matrix, 8 structural defenses, replacement playbook, backup registry for every role, instant handoff spec via Claude.
rows.col_5: Every persistent role has a backup identified before Day 1. Handoff packet generated in 30-45 min. Replacement operational same day.

rows.col_3: Who finds who. Nilo finds Recruiter + MC. Recruiter finds everyone else. PM→Nilo domain question protocol.
rows.col_4: Hiring sequence + domain question protocol + recruiter job spec
rows.col_5: Nilo's recruiting load: 2 hires. Everything else through Recruiter.

rows.col_3: I-level cut to 3 workstreams. CL-7/CL-8 deferred to post-funding.
rows.col_5: Active production = CL-0 through CL-6 + I1/I4/I9.

rows.col_3: 5 artifacts that need full depth before production. Recruiting weapons.
rows.col_4: Priority table with "what deep looks like" specs
rows.col_5: Show bible, pitch deck, M0 thesis, expert packet, storefront mockup.

rows.col_3: Show identity, two content formats, episode categories, visual spec
3 sample beat sheets: entrance conversation, expert review, daily highlight
First 20 episodes scheduled with thumbnail concepts + AI prompt for feed mockup
5-slide deck content: what, why credible, what you get, who's in, your role
Visual design system + distribution + customization spec
15 required fields across ICP, positioning, product, distribution, finance, kill criteria
Which clusters read which M0 fields. Dependency map.
4-page onboarding packet: what is IonWave, your cluster, sample V-tab, comp
A through F grading rubric with per-tab review requirements
8-section landing page spec with AI image prompts for mockup generation
Brand identity + packaging spec + AI prompts for product mockups
Rolling 2-week commitments. Daily check-ins. 24/48/72-hour tripwires. Re-up ritual. Public accountability via show.
Academic paper: The Trade as scaffolded architecture for controlled unfolding. Theory + IonWave case + show meta-layer.
